speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "Leave what's dearest to you for me and I just might leave you alone."

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "Give me that trinket!"

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "I didn't expect less."

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "We now rule in this world mortal, remember that."

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "Just don't call us mere "demons" mortal, we are far greater than that."

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "One more yon and I will buy me some sake at Boss's place."

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "Our Boss would love to have another head mounted in his castle."

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "Wait for Boss to hear about this!"

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: a loud croak!

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: a thunderclap-like battlecry!

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "I am a god!  How could you kill a god?"

speaker: mon_tengu
sound: "This is pathetic!"

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: a loud croak!

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: a thunderclap-like battlecry!

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "I am a god!  How could you kill a god?"

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "You had it coming."

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "Too bad.  I will have to clean my naginata after this!"

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "How much do people need to tell you to leave things how they are?"

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "A mortal is most useful when it is away."

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: a quiet whistle

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "All I need is to stay alone."

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "Others of my race would rob your corpse naked but I will be more gentle with it."

speaker: mon_tengu_monk
sound: "Your kind is so adaptive which always impressed me.  Too bad your time on Earth is over."

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "What's this?  A mortal who is putting up a fight? That's cute!"

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "My fur!  Now it's all icky."

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "I hope this human has some lamp oil, haven't tasted it in a while..."

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "My claws are much sharper than those of a lesser feline!"

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "Hmmm, my fish bone comb makes my fur stink a bit. Should I get a human bone one instead?"

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: a quiet meow.

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: a loud meow!

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "All of your kind that survived seem to have at least one mental defect.  Are you another case of a hoader?"

speaker: mon_nekomata
sound: "For how much yon does a fish sell this day anyway?"

speaker: mon_kappa
sound: a bizarre croak!

speaker: mon_kappa
sound: "Cucumber, cucumber, delicious cucumber... ~".

speaker: mon_kappa
sound: "There is one negative aspect to this apocalypse - no more mortal offsprings to eat."

speaker: mon_kappa
sound: "Knowing that all humans left are potential youkai hunters always make me jumpy."

speaker: mon_kappa
sound: "You humans just work all day on the shore, let me take you where it's wetter and better!"

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: a bizarre croak!

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "Cucumber, cucumber, delicious cucumber... ~".

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "Humans are icky when they move, but nowadays they tend to carry a lot of useful parts."

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "Knowing that all humans left are potential youkai hunters always make me jumpy."

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "You humans just work all day on the shore, let me take you where it's wetter and better!"

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "HEY!  You have tools, right?!  I mean, what fools don't walk with their tools?"

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "Building robots while humans are gone is soooo much fun!"

speaker: mon_kappa_engineer
sound: "On a scale from 1 to 10 I would give this idiocy a solid 9."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "Gimmie all your stuff mortal!"

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "I am gonna drink some sake after that one."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "HAH! Is that all you have?"

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "I'd love to eat something good at Boss's place.  Hope you deliver!"

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "Just don't call us mere "demons" mortal, we are far greater than that."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "One more yon and I will buy me some sake at Boss's place."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "Our Boss would love to have another head mounted in his castle."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "Wait for Boss to hear about this!"

speaker: mon_oni
sound: a loud shout!

speaker: mon_oni
sound: a loud stomp!

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "I smash mortals like you into dust."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "I spot with my little third eye that you will be quite a good catch for the day."

speaker: mon_oni
sound: "It's all over when you mess with an ogre."
